General.Name: Chengdu Hongqi Chain Co Ltd
General.Description: Chengdu Hongqi Chain Co.,Ltd. operates a chain of convenience stores in Sichuan Province, China. It operates approximately 2,900 stores. The company also operates a multi-functional convenience service platform. Chengdu Hongqi Chain Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Chengdu, China.

1.Name: Mr. Zeng Jun  Cao
1.Title: Vice Chairman, Deputy GM & Company Sec.
